itemDisplayName: Windows WPF and UWP Applications used to test Azure Media Services Authentication
description: Windows WPF and UWP Applications used to test Azure Media Services Authentication
summary: Windows WPF Application is based on Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client library. Windows UWP Application is based on REST API call using HttpClient, the User Interactive Authentication is based on Microsoft.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory ADAL Library
